name: Prototyper BETA
description:
Create gamepad navigation prototypes in a snap for Xbox One, Playstation 4 or Switch Pro controllers.


Usage

Generate Prototype: Select component instances within a single top-level frame to generate a complete prototype.


Link Frames: When not working with components, manually design each top-level frame in the prototype, then link them to create a prototype.


Prototyper will automatically create prototype interactions based on the relative position of selected elements. In most cases your prototypes will just work out of the box. However, in rare cases such as when prototyping asymmetric grids, you may need to edit the interactions to get them right.


Open Source

Prototyper is open source and contributions are welcome!


Contributors

  • Alex Tokmakchiev - PS4 Controller Keycodes
  • Antoine Plu - PlayStation Controller icons
